In the end it's just him thinking about how to apologize to her the next day and her coming home turning on the lights and she starts crying how everything she was saving for him was stolen by the other guy (her virginity first kiss etc) and how her future with the cuck is shattered and she can't go back and I guess there's a 2nd part or this was a prequel to another series where becomes a nympho or something.
